description: 15 years worth of gardening converted a garbage strewn lot to a place where apples, plums, peaches, pears, raspberries, apricots, grapes, watermelon and blueberries grow. The garden is adjacent to a park, so anytime there's any kind of event the garden is open. Events from Mother's Day to local Olympics keep the garden very active.
name: William Rainey Garden
